name: (/products-and-docs/widgets/countdown/) VISUAL TAB - Check Layout Orientations

testSteps.description: (/products-and-docs/widgets/countdown/) VISUAL TAB - Check Layout Orientations #1: {orientation=horizontal, regression-widgets=}

children.description: Then the pop-up Embedded Code is opened
And embedded html code contains stored layout orientation
(/products-and-docs/widgets/countdown/) VISUAL TAB - Check Layout Orientations #2: {orientation=vertical, regression-widgets=}
Then the pop-up Embedded Code is opened
And embedded html code contains stored layout orientation

userStory.narrative:
In order to setup Countdown Widget
As a developer
I want to use the widget configurator to customize the layout of the widget,
and have ability to grab a small code snippet to insert into 3-rd party websites

title: (/products-and-docs/widgets/countdown/) VISUAL TAB - Check Layout Orientations

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given open Countdown Widget page
And switch to VISUAL Tab
And set layout orientation to <orientation>
When click on "Get code" button
Then the pop-up Embedded Code is opened
And embedded html code contains stored layout orientation
